news.title: Mint explainer: Why is India setting up a second crop gene bank in Himachal’s Keylong?
news.description: India plans a second national crop gene bank in Himachal’s Keylong to back up vital seeds, protect biodiversity, and insure food security against climate shocks, disasters and geopolitical risks.
